name: mugan86-ng-google-analytics
description: Angular Library to track Google Analytics events and navigate

scripts.version.patch.build: npm run version.patch && ng build mugan86-google-analytics
scripts.version.minor.build: npm run version.minor && ng build mugan86-google-analytics
scripts.version.major.build: npm run version.major && ng build mugan86-google-analytics

author: Anartz Mugika Ledo <mugan86@gmail.com>
